entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who has vanished and is being questioned by Ginny. He is described as being at the castle with a couple of girlfriends.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as demanding to know where Harry had been and questioning him about Malfoy.

entities.name: coote
entities.description: Coote is mentioned as one of the Beaters who are hitting their clubs nervously against their legs.

entities.name: peakes
entities.description: Peakes is mentioned as one of the Beaters who are hitting their clubs nervously against their legs.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who has been with Malfoy and is now being questioned by Ginny.

relationships.description: Harry met Malfoy, as described in the text: 'I met Malfoy'.
Ginny questioned Harry about his whereabouts and his encounter with Malfoy.
